MEMORANDUM
September 269 1963
TO s NAEB Committee
Marion Corwell 9 Chairman
SUBJECT i PUBLIC REJATIONS CQT.CHTTEE MEETING
We have reserved the period from 32 *15 p.cu to 2 p0m<, on Wednesday*
November 20, for a meeting of our Public Relations Committee.
We will meet in the hotel dining room at 12il5 p.au and have an informal
luncheon meeting followed by a more serious session in a room reserved
for our use©
Please make every effort to attend this meeting since it is the only
opportunity during the year to discuss problems which affect the Public
Relations of the National Association of Educational Broadcasters» We
will ultize this opportunity to complete details pertaining to the Speakers
Directory which our national office has asked us to prepare©
I»m looking forward to seeing you all on November 20 in Milwaukee©
MC/ajh
